nodes.id: 中国人民解放军海军航空兵

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军海军航空兵
en: People's Liberation Army Naval Air Force

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军海军的航空兵部队，拥有战斗机、反潜机、预警机、电子战机、直升机等多种机型。2023年改革后，主要转向以舰载机为核心的海上空中力量。
description.en: The naval aviation branch of the People's Liberation Army Navy, operating various types of aircraft such as fighters, anti-submarine aircraft, early warning aircraft, electronic warfare aircraft, and helicopters. After reforms in 2023, it has shifted its focus to become a maritime air power centered on carrier-based aircraft.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的海上武装力量，是中国人民解放军的海上分支。
description.en: The naval warfare branch of the People's Liberation Army, the maritime armed forces of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的空中武装力量，是中国人民解放军的空中分支。
description.en: The aerial warfare service branch of the People's Liberation Army, the air force of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 曾是中国人民解放军海军航空兵的领导指挥机构，经历了数次设立与撤销。
description.en: Formerly the leading command organ of the PLA Naval Air Force, which was established and disestablished multiple times.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军海军首任司令员，于1952年上报了组建海军航空兵飞行部队的请示报告。
description.en: The first commander of the PLA Navy, who submitted a report in 1952 requesting the formation of naval aviation flight units.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国第一任国务院总理。他于1952年批示同意了海军航空兵的建设方针。
description.en: The first Premier of the People's Republic of China. In 1952, he approved the guiding principles for the construction of the Naval Air Force.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的主要缔造者和第一代最高领导人。他于1952年批准了组建海军航空兵的计划，并曾多次亲自点将“海空雄鹰团”出征。
description.en: The main founder and first paramount leader of the People's Republic of China. He approved the plan to establish the Naval Air Force in 1952 and personally ordered the 'Sea Hawk Regiment' into battle on multiple occasions.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军第十军

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军第十军
en: 10th Corps of the People's Liberation Army

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的一支陆军部队，其军部被用作组建海军航空部（后为海军航空兵部）的基础。
description.en: An army unit of the PLA, whose headquarters was used as the basis for forming the Naval Aviation Department (later the Naval Air Force Department).

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军海军中将，海军航空兵部首任司令员。
description.en: A lieutenant general of the PLA Navy and the first commander of the Naval Air Force Department.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军海军少将，海军航空兵部首任政治委员之一。
description.en: A major general of the PLA Navy, one of the first political commissars of the Naval Air Force Department.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军首次陆、海、空三军协同作战的战役，海军航空兵部队参与了此次作战。
description.en: The first joint-amphibious operation of the People's Liberation Army involving land, sea, and air forces, in which PLA Naval Air Force units participated.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军海军航空兵的飞行师，是轰炸机师，参与了一江山岛战役。
description.en: A flying division of the PLA Naval Air Force, designated as a bomber division, which participated in the Battle of Yijiangshan Islands.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军海军航空兵的飞行师，是歼击机师，曾在50年代空战中取得辉煌战绩。
description.en: A flying division of the PLA Naval Air Force, designated as a fighter division, which achieved significant victories in air combat during the 1950s.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的空中武装力量。
description.en: The aerial warfare service branch of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军海军航空兵的飞行师，下辖著名的“海空雄鹰团”。
description.en: A flying division of the PLA Naval Air Force, which includes the famous 'Sea Hawk Regiment'.

description.zh-cn: 国防部授予海军航空兵第4师第10团的荣誉称号，以表彰其在国土防空中的突出战绩。
description.en: An honorary title awarded by the Ministry of National Defense to the 10th Regiment of the Naval Aviation 4th Division for its outstanding combat record in national air defense.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国防部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国防部
en: Ministry of National Defense of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军海军航空兵的飞行师，是轰炸机师。因九一三事件受到影响。
description.en: A flying division of the PLA Naval Air Force, designated as a bomber division. It was affected by the Lin Biao incident.

description.zh-cn: 指林彪等人乘坐256号三叉戟飞机从海航五师所辖的山海关机场强行起飞后坠毁的事件。
description.en: Refers to the event where Lin Biao and others crashed in a Trident jet after forcibly taking off from Shanhaiguan Airport, which was under the jurisdiction of the Naval Aviation 5th Division.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军海军航空兵的飞行师，是歼击机师。曾取得辉煌战绩，但也因刘承司叛逃事件长期蒙受阴影。
description.en: A flying division of the PLA Naval Air Force, designated as a fighter division. It achieved brilliant combat records but was also long overshadowed by the defection of pilot Liu Chengsi.

description.zh-cn: 原海军航空兵第6师飞行员，于1962年3月3日驾机叛逃。
description.en: A former pilot of the Naval Aviation 6th Division who defected by flying his aircraft on March 3, 1962.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军海军航空兵的飞行师，前身为海航第12师。飞行员王伟隶属该师。
description.en: A flying division of the PLA Naval Air Force, formerly the Naval Aviation 12th Division. Pilot Wang Wei was assigned to this division.

description.zh-cn: 海军航空兵第9师歼-8II战斗机飞行员，在2001年中美南海撞机事件中失踪牺牲，后被追授“海空卫士”荣誉称号。
description.en: A J-8II fighter pilot of the Naval Aviation 9th Division who went missing and was killed in the 2001 Hainan Island incident, posthumously honored as the 'Guardian of Territorial Airspace and Waters'.

description.zh-cn: 一架美国海军EP-3型侦察机与一架中国人民解放军海军航空兵歼-8II战斗机在南中国海相撞的事件，导致飞行员王伟牺牲。
description.en: An incident in which a United States Navy EP-3 surveillance aircraft collided with a PLA Naval Air Force J-8II interceptor fighter jet over the South China Sea, resulting in the death of pilot Wang Wei.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军海军舰载航空兵部队

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军海军舰载航空兵部队
en: People's Liberation Army Navy Carrier-Borne Aviation Force

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军海军航空兵中负责操作航空母舰舰载机的部队。
description.en: The force within the PLA Naval Air Force responsible for operating aircraft from aircraft carriers.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军海军首支舰载航空兵部队。
description.en: The first carrier-borne aviation unit of the PLA Navy.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军海军上将，曾任海军司令员。他为舰载航空兵第1联队授旗。
description.en: An admiral of the PLA Navy who served as the Commander of the Navy. He presented the military flag to the Carrier-Borne Aviation 1st Wing.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军海军大校，舰载航空兵第1联队首任联队长。
description.en: A senior captain of the PLA Navy and the first commander of the Carrier-Borne Aviation 1st Wing.

relationships.source: 中国人民解放军海军航空兵

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军海军航空兵是中国人民解放军海军的航空兵部队。
description.en: The PLA Naval Air Force is the aviation branch of the PLA Navy.

relationships.source: 中国人民解放军海军航空兵

description.zh-cn: 2023年，海军航空兵将大部分陆基单位转隶至中国人民解放军空军，以更加重视军种协作。
description.en: In 2023, the Naval Air Force transferred most of its land-based units to the PLA Air Force to place greater emphasis on inter-service cooperation.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军海军航空兵

description.zh-cn: 1952年1月8日，时任海军司令员萧劲光向中央军委上报请示报告，正式报请组建航空兵飞行部队。
description.en: On January 8, 1952, then-Navy Commander Xiao Jinguang submitted a report to the Central Military Commission officially requesting the establishment of naval aviation flight units.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军海军航空兵

description.zh-cn: 1952年8月24日，周恩来总理批示同意海军提出的空军建设方针。
description.en: On August 24, 1952, Premier Zhou Enlai approved the guiding principles for the construction of the naval air force proposed by the Navy.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军海军航空兵

description.zh-cn: 1952年8月24日，毛泽东批示同意组建海军航空兵。
description.en: On August 24, 1952, Mao Zedong approved the establishment of the Naval Air Force.

relationships.source: 中国人民解放军第十军

description.zh-cn: 1952年9月6日，海军航空部以陆军第10军军部为基础在北京成立。
description.en: On September 6, 1952, the Naval Aviation Department was established in Beijing based on the headquarters of the Army's 10th Corps.

description.zh-cn: 顿星云是海军航空兵部首任司令员。
description.en: Dun Xingyun was the first commander of the Naval Air Force Department.

description.zh-cn: 李呈瑞是海军航空兵部首任政治委员之一。
description.en: Li Chengrui was one of the first political commissars of the Naval Air Force Department.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军海军航空兵

description.zh-cn: 海航1师的轰炸机和歼击机团参加了一江山岛战役的空中突击和护航任务。
description.en: The bomber and fighter regiments of the Naval Aviation 1st Division participated in air strike and escort missions during the Battle of Yijiangshan Islands.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军海军航空兵

description.zh-cn: 海航2师在1950年代多次与中华民国空军飞机交战并取得战绩，为一江山岛战役夺取了浙东沿海的制空权。
description.en: The Naval Aviation 2nd Division engaged and achieved victories against Republic of China Air Force aircraft multiple times in the 1950s, securing air superiority over the eastern Zhejiang coast for the Battle of Yijiangshan Islands.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国国防部

description.zh-cn: 1965年12月29日，国防部授予海军航空兵第4师第10团“海空雄鹰团”的荣誉称号。
description.en: On December 29, 1965, the Ministry of National Defense awarded the honorary title of 'Sea Hawk Regiment' to the 10th Regiment of the Naval Aviation 4th Division.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东曾先后三次亲自点将“海空雄鹰团”（海军航空兵第4师第10团）出征。
description.en: Mao Zedong personally ordered the 'Sea Hawk Regiment' (10th Regiment, Naval Aviation 4th Division) into battle on three occasions.

description.zh-cn: 九一三事件中林彪等人乘坐的飞机从海航五师所辖的山海关机场强行起飞，导致该师多名干部受到审查。
description.en: During the Lin Biao incident, the plane carrying Lin Biao and others forcibly took off from Shanhaiguan Airport, which was under the jurisdiction of the Naval Aviation 5th Division, leading to investigations of many cadres in the division.

description.zh-cn: 飞行员刘承司于1962年3月3日叛逃，此事使海航6师长期蒙受阴影。
description.en: Pilot Liu Chengsi's defection on March 3, 1962, cast a long shadow over the Naval Aviation 6th Division.

description.zh-cn: 1967年6月26日，海航6师击落一架美国空军F-4C战斗机。
description.en: On June 26, 1967, the Naval Aviation 6th Division shot down a USAF F-4C fighter jet.

description.zh-cn: 1968年2月14日，海航6师击落一架美国海军A-1H舰载攻击机，并击伤另一架。
description.en: On February 14, 1968, the Naval Aviation 6th Division shot down one US Navy A-1H carrier-based attack aircraft and damaged another.

description.zh-cn: 在2001年中美南海撞机事件中，飞行员王伟失踪牺牲。
description.en: In the 2001 Hainan Island incident, pilot Wang Wei went missing and was killed.

description.zh-cn: 时任海军司令员吴胜利在舰载航空兵第1联队成立仪式上为其授予军旗。
description.en: Then-Navy Commander Wu Shengli presented the military flag to the Carrier-Borne Aviation 1st Wing at its founding ceremony.

description.zh-cn: 随着航空母舰山东舰的入役，舰载航空兵第2联队也随之组建。
description.en: With the commissioning of the aircraft carrier Shandong, the Carrier-Borne Aviation 2nd Wing was established.

relationships.source: 中国人民解放军海军舰载航空兵部队
relationships.target: 中国人民解放军海军航空兵

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军海军舰载航空兵部队是中国人民解放军海军航空兵的下属部队。
description.en: The PLA Navy Carrier-Borne Aviation Force is a subordinate unit of the PLA Naval Air Force.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军海军舰载航空兵部队
中国人民解放军海军舰载航空兵部队
